#summary Dependency Injection in FFEAD

depInj.xml

{{{
<beans>
    <!--Define a new Bean of type TestBean and inject objects as properties
        Setter Injection
    -->
    <bean name="testBean" class="TestBean" injectAs="prop">
        <!--Inject bean with name dependencyBean1-->
        <inject bean="dependencyBean1">
        <!--Inject bean with name dependencyBean2-->
        <inject bean="dependencyBean2">
        <!--Inject bean with type DependencyBean3-->
        <inject class="DependencyBean3">
        <!--Inject a string with value-->
        <inject inbuilt="string" value="Hello!!">
    </bean>

    <!--Define a new Bean of type DependencyBean1-->
    <bean name="dependencyBean1" class="DependencyBean1"/>

    <!--Define a new Bean of type DependencyBean2 and inject objects as constructor args
        Constructor Injection
    -->
    <bean name="dependencyBean2" class="DependencyBean2" injectAs="cons">
        <!--Inject an integer value-->
        <inject inbuilt="int" value="1234">
        <!--Inject a boolean value-->        
        <inject inbuilt="bool" value="true">
    </bean>

    <!--Define a new Bean of type DependencyBean2 and inject objects as compatible interfaces
        Interface Injection
    -->
    <bean name="dependencyBean2" class="DependencyBean2" injectAs="intf">
        <!--Inject bean with interface type DepDependencyBean1-->
        <inject intfType="DepDependencyIntf1">
        <!--Inject bean with interface type DepDependencyBean2-->
        <inject intfType="DepDependencyIntf2">
    </bean>

    <!--Define a new Bean of type DepDependencyBean1Impl which implements DepDependencyIntf2 interface-->
    <bean name="depdependencyBean1" class="DepDependencyBean1Impl"/>

    <!--Define a new Bean of type DepDependencyBean2Impl which implements DepDependencyIntf2 interface-->
    <bean name="depdependencyBean2" class="DepDependencyBean2Impl"/>
</beans>
}}}
